_notes.purpose: Enable SPA-style client-side routing for React Router on Vercel.
_notes.how_it_works: Any path is rewritten to /index.html so the client app handles routing.
_notes.when_to_use: Use this when deploying a Vite React SPA without server-side routing.
env_vars: Set VITE_API_URL in Vercel Project Settings > Environment Variables to your backend URL.
